snippet: Commodities rose broadly on Friday, ending August with a third consecutive month of gains, after strong rallies through most of the month in oil, soybeans and cocoa.
abstract: Commodities prices rise broadly in August, the third consecutive month of gains, after strong rallies in oil, soybeans and cocoa.
lead_paragraph: Commodities rose broadly on Friday, ending August with a third consecutive month of gains, after strong rallies through most of the month in oil, soybeans and cocoa.

headline.main: Commodities Prices Rise Broadly for a Monthly Gain
headline.print_headline: Commodities Prices Rise Broadly For a Monthly Gain
